title: League Client Bug
body:
okay so i every time i finish a game, the client goes into this state where the outer half is complete black, can someone help me? its like the launcher resolution edited itself but it failed so it glitched that way

i already tried changing resolution, it didnt work

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please [download the HRT (Hextech Repair Tool)](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) for your OS and run a repair through that. Let me know how that goes.
